content: this legal case involves two parties sklep and vrhovno sodišče rs ii dor 1352015 the case started with a cost procedure followed by a first instance judgment but no details about the outcome were provided the supreme court was also involved but no specific details were given the case revolves around the ownership of certain properties and household items with a 50 ownership division between the plaintiff and defendant the defendant challenged a court order and requested a revision claiming procedural irregularities the court of appeal reviewed the case and rejected the revision upholding the initial judgment the defendant then requested another revision claiming errors in the application of the law and procedural rules the court of first instance granted the defendants appeal dismissed the action and referred the case back for a new trial the defendant raised issues regarding an extramarital relationship lack of relevant facts and evidence and a breach of the civil procedure act a different judge took over the case and specified the extent of the coowned property the court appointed a building expert to assess the properties the defendant objected to the extent of the coowned property and claimed it was subject to a loan repayment the court of appeal upheld the plaintiffs appeal and set aside a stay order the defendant challenged the order from the high court and district court and the supreme court dismissed part of the review order the defendant raised issues of erroneous findings and procedural irregularities the court of second instance reviewed alleged infringements but could not make findings on procedural conduct or take new evidence the court found the complaint about the judgment regarding coowned property to be unfounded and dismissed the appeal

metadata.CASE_ID: Sklep Vrhovnega sodišča RS II DoR 135/2015, 27. 8. 2015
